{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ZTE |model=AC30 |revision=(Verizon) |upc= |ean= |asin=B004MEX0T8;US; |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/15/2010 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=mobile hotspot |fcc_id=Q78-ZTEAC30 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=0.7 |pwr_conn= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=MSM7625 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR6102G |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none=true |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed= |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=portable,battery |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=Verizon AC30 XXXX |default_ssid_regex=^Verizon AC30 [A-F0-9](4)$ |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=98:F5:37 |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} RAM + Flash combo chip may be a H8BCS0UN0MCP-46M
The default SSID appears to be '''Verizon AC30 XXXX''' where '''XXXX''' is the last four hex digits of the wireless interface MAC address. The default password [http://support.verizonwireless.com/clc/devices/knowledge_base.html?id=36426 appears to be the MEID].
